meeting_request.purpose: Struggling academically and feeling lost in my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Eric, a senior majoring in East Asian Languages and Literatures. Last semester was really tough — I fell behind in most of my courses, and I’m still not back on track. My grades are down significantly, and I’m starting to feel really discouraged. I’ve been struggling with writing and reading in Chinese, and I’m not sure if I even understand what I’m doing wrong. I’ve been talking to my professors, but they seem frustrated by my performance and are encouraging me to take a break. I’m also dealing with personal issues that have been weighing me down, and I’m not sure how to balance both academics and my personal life. I’m feeling really overwhelmed and not sure if I’m going to make it through this semester without falling further behind.
